trans-unit.source: Represents a 3x2 matrix.
Creates a 3x2 matrix from the specified components.
trans-unit.target: 从指定分量创建 3x2 矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the first element in the first row.
trans-unit.target: 要分配给第一行中的第一个元素的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the second element in the first row.
trans-unit.target: 要分配给第一行中的第二个元素的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the first element in the second row.
trans-unit.target: 要分配给第二个行中的第一个元素的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the second element in the second row.
trans-unit.target: 要分配给第二个行中的第二个元素的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the first element in the third row.
trans-unit.target: 要分配给第三个行中的第一个元素的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the second element in the third row.
trans-unit.target: 要分配给第三个行中的第二个元素的值。

trans-unit.source: Adds each element in one matrix with its corresponding element in a second matrix.
trans-unit.target: 将第二个矩阵中的对应元素具有一个矩阵中的每个元素。

trans-unit.source: The first matrix.
The second matrix.
The matrix that contains the summed values of value1 and value2.
trans-unit.target: 包含总和的值的矩阵 value1 和 value2 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rotation matrix using the given rotation in radians.
trans-unit.target: 创建使用给定的旋转以弧度表示的旋转矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotation, in radians.
The rotation matrix.
Creates a rotation matrix using the specified rotation in radians and a center point.
trans-unit.target: 创建使用指定的旋转以弧度为单位和中心点的旋转矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotation, in radians.
The center point.
The rotation matrix.
Creates a scaling matrix from the specified vector scale.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的向量比例创建缩放矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The scale to use.
The scaling matrix.
Creates a scaling matrix that scales uniformly with the given scale.
trans-unit.target: 创建使用给定比例统一缩放的缩放矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The uniform scale to use.
The scaling matrix.
Creates a scaling matrix from the specified vector scale with an offset from the specified center point.
trans-unit.target: 从相对于指定的中心点的偏移量将指定的向量比例创建缩放矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The scale to use.
The center offset.
The scaling matrix.
Creates a scaling matrix that scales uniformly with the specified scale with an offset from the specified center.
trans-unit.target: 创建通过指定相对于指定中心的偏移量比例统一缩放矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The uniform scale to use.
The center offset.
The scaling matrix.
Creates a scaling matrix from the specified X and Y components.
trans-unit.target: 创建缩放矩阵从指定 X 和 Y 分量。

trans-unit.source: The value to scale by on the X axis.
trans-unit.target: 要在 X 轴上的缩放量的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to scale by on the Y axis.
trans-unit.target: 要在 Y 轴上的缩放量的值。

trans-unit.source: The scaling matrix.
Creates a scaling matrix that is offset by a given center point.
trans-unit.target: 创建按给定的中心点偏移的缩放矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The value to scale by on the X axis.
trans-unit.target: 要在 X 轴上的缩放量的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to scale by on the Y axis.
trans-unit.target: 要在 Y 轴上的缩放量的值。

trans-unit.source: The center point.
The scaling matrix.
Creates a skew matrix from the specified angles in radians.
trans-unit.target: 从指定角度以弧度为单位创建斜矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The X angle, in radians.
trans-unit.target: X 角度以弧度为单位。

trans-unit.source: The Y angle, in radians.
trans-unit.target: Y 角度以弧度为单位。

trans-unit.source: The skew matrix.
Creates a skew matrix from the specified angles in radians and a center point.
trans-unit.target: 从指定角度以弧度为单位和中心点创建斜矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The X angle, in radians.
trans-unit.target: X 角度以弧度为单位。

trans-unit.source: The Y angle, in radians.
trans-unit.target: Y 角度以弧度为单位。

trans-unit.source: The center point.
The skew matrix.
Creates a translation matrix from the specified 2-dimensional vector.
trans-unit.target: 从指定二维向量创建平移矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The translation position.
The translation matrix.
Creates a translation matrix from the specified X and Y components.
trans-unit.target: 创建平移矩阵从指定 X 和 Y 分量。

trans-unit.source: The X position.
The Y position.
The translation matrix.
Returns a value that indicates whether this instance and another 3x2 matrix are equal.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例与另一个的 3 x 2 矩阵是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Two matrices are equal if all their corresponding elements are equal.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有相应元素相等，则两个矩阵相等。

trans-unit.source: The other matrix.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two matrices are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果两个矩阵相等，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例与指定的对象是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The current instance and `obj` are equal if `obj` is a <xref:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2> object and the corresponding elements of each matrix are equal.
trans-unit.target: 当前实例和`obj`相等如果`obj`是<xref:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2>对象和每个矩阵的对应元素是否相等。</xref:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: if the current instance and obj are equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果当前实例和 obj 相等; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: If obj is , the method returns .
trans-unit.target: If obj is , the method returns .

trans-unit.source: Calculates the determinant for this matrix.
The determinant is calculated by expanding the matrix with a third column whose values are (0,0,1).
trans-unit.target: 通过扩展该矩阵具有其值是 (0,0,1) 的第三个列计算行列式。

trans-unit.source: The determinant.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The hash code.
Gets the multiplicative identity matrix.
The multiplicative identify matrix.
Inverts the specified matrix.
The return value indicates whether the operation succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 返回值指示操作是否成功。

trans-unit.source: The matrix to invert.
When this method returns, contains the inverted matrix if the operation succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，如果操作成功，则包含逆的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: if matrix was converted successfully; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 matrix 成功; 否则为转换 。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current matrix is the identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: 指示当前矩阵是否为单位矩阵。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current matrix is the identity matrix; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前矩阵为单位矩阵;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Performs a linear interpolation from one matrix to a second matrix based on a value that specifies the weighting of the second matrix.
trans-unit.target: 从一个矩阵向基于指定第二个矩阵的权重的值的第二个矩阵执行线性内插。

trans-unit.source: The first matrix.
The second matrix.
The relative weighting of `matrix2`.
The interpolated matrix.
The first element of the first row.
trans-unit.target: 第一个行的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The second element of the first row.
To be added.
The first element of the second row.
trans-unit.target: 第二个行的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The second element of the second row.
To be added.
The first element of the third row.
trans-unit.target: 第三个行的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The second element of the third row.
trans-unit.target: 第三个行的第二个元素。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Returns the matrix that results from multiplying two matrices together.
trans-unit.target: 返回从两个矩阵相乘得到的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The first matrix.
The second matrix.
The product matrix.
Returns the matrix that results from scaling all the elements of a specified matrix by a scalar factor.
trans-unit.target: 返回按标量系数缩放指定矩阵的所有元素后得到的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The matrix to scale.
The scaling value to use.
The scaled matrix.
Negates the specified matrix by multiplying all its values by -1.
trans-unit.target: 对指定的矩阵求反通过其所有值都乘以-1。

trans-unit.source: The matrix to negate.
The negated matrix.

trans-unit.target: 添加方法定义的操作的加法运算符<xref:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2>对象。</xref:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2>

trans-unit.source: The first matrix.
The second matrix.

trans-unit.source: Two matrices are equal if all their corresponding elements are equal.

trans-unit.target: Multiply 方法定义的操作的乘法运算符<xref:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2>对象。</xref:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2>

The scaling value to use.

Subtracts each element in a second matrix from its corresponding element in a first matrix.
trans-unit.target: 中减去第二个矩阵中的第一个矩阵中的对应元素中的每个元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.Subtract%2A> method defines the operation of the subtraction operator for <xref:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.Subtract%2A>方法定义的减法运算符，用于操作<xref:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2>对象。</xref:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2> </xref:System.Numerics.Matrix3x2.Subtract%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first matrix.
The second matrix.
The matrix containing the values that result from subtracting each element in value2 from its corresponding element in value1.
trans-unit.target: 包含从中的每个元素中减去得到的值的矩阵 value2 中的对应元素从 value1 。

The negated matrix.
Subtracts each element in a second matrix from its corresponding element in a first matrix.

trans-unit.source: The first matrix.
The second matrix.

trans-unit.target: 包含从中的每个元素中减去得到的值的矩阵 value2 中的对应元素从 value1 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents this matrix.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示此矩阵的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The numeric values in the returned string are formatted by using the conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串中的数字值设置格式的使用当前区域性的约定。

trans-unit.source: For example, for the en-US culture, the returned string might appear as `{ {M11:1.1 M12:1.2} {M21:2.1 M22:2.2} {M31:3.1 M32:3.2} }`.
The string representation of this matrix.
trans-unit.target: 此矩阵的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the translation component of this matrix.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此矩阵的平移分量。

trans-unit.source: The translation component of the current instance.
